import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../FormEstilos/formAddMarca.css'; import { agregarMarcaApi } from "../../../Api/Sistema/marcas"; export default function FormAddMarca() { const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ codigo: "", nombre: "", nacionalidad: "", cedulaJuridica: "", nombreEmpesa: "", detalleEmpresa: "", telefono: "", descripcion: "", fotoMarca: "", fotoEmpresa: "" }); const changeForm = e => { if (e.target.name != "fileMarca" || e.target.name !== "fileProvee") { setInputs({ ...inputs, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } }; const fileSelectedHandler = e => { const i = document.getElementById("imgMarca"); let reader = new FileReader(); let y = e.target.files[0]; i.src = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); inputs.fotoMarca = reader.readAsDataURL(y); reader.onload = function () { inputs.fotoMarca = reader.result; }; } const fileSelectedHandler2 = e => { const i = document.getElementById("imgProv"); let reader = new FileReader(); let y = e.target.files[0]; i.src = URL.createObjectURL(e.target.files[0]); inputs.fotoEmpresa = reader.readAsDataURL(y); reader.onload = function () { inputs.fotoEmpresa = reader.result; }; } const show = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const result = agregarMarcaApi(inputs); } return (
